          <title>
            <string language="en">Drying clothes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trocknende Kleidung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vêtements de séchage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Roupa de secagem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vestiti di secchezza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ξεραίνοντας ενδύματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ropas de sequía</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that wet clothes will dry quickest when the weather is sunny and breezy.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">clothes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">drying</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">evaporation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sunny</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wet</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß nasse Kleidung am 
schnellsten trocknet, wenn das Wetter sonnig und breezy ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que les vêtements 
humides sécheront le plus vite quand le survivre à est ensoleillé et
frais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a roupa molhada 
secará o mais rapidamente quando o tempo é ensolarado e breezy.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che i vestiti bagnati 
si asciugheranno il più rapidamente quando il tempo è pieno di sole 
e breezy.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι τα υγρά ενδύματα θα 
ξεράνουν ο πιό γρήγορα όταν ο καιρός είναι ηλιόλουστος και 
ανεμοδαρμένος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que las ropas mojadas se
secarán lo más aprisa posible cuando el tiempo es asoleado y 
ventoso.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kleidung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trocknen</string>
          </keyword>
